com.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.ui.panel.card

Class CardBeanInfoPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.ui.panel.card.CardBeanInfoPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class CardBeanInfoPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.lang.Runnable
    This class provides JPanel which displays information regarding a single CardBean object.
    Author:
    Sebastian Dine
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void mouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      This method creates a DialogShowCardImage object with the front or back image of the corresponding internal CardBean object, depending on whether the icon for the back or front image has been pressed.
      void mouseEntered(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      This method changes the color of the icon for the front or back image to light gray, when the mouse hovers into the icon.
      void mouseExited(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      This method changes the color of the icon for the front or back image to its normal color, when the mouse hovers out of the icon.
      void mousePressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e) 
      void mouseReleased(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e) 
      void run()
      This method displays a loading spinner at the card image section until the corresponding card image has been loaded from the official API.
      void setSelectedCard(CardBean bean)
      This method updates all UI elements, using data from the given CardBean object.

      • setSelectedCard

        public void setSelectedCard(CardBean bean)
        This method updates all UI elements, using data from the given CardBean object.
        Parameters:
        bean - CardBean object, which should be displayed via this JPanel.

      • mouseClicked

        public void mouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)

      • run

        public void run()
        This method displays a loading spinner at the card image section until the corresponding card image has been loaded from the official API. Afterwards the correct image will be shown.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
